name: The Gift That Keeps on Yeeting
name_original: The Gift That Keeps on Yeeting
description:
Yeetmas is here!

Jingle bells
Santa's late
He sure could use your help
Drop those presents down the chimney
Or the whole thing goes to hell!

Help santa yeet the presents into the chimney for every person on the planet. Drag to aim and fire the presents, but watch out for any obstacles.

Programmer - https://squizout.itch.io/

Artist - https://chipmunkgames.itch.io/

Submitted as part of the Yogscast Jingle Jam.
